member_organisations:
Le Cluster Maritime Luxembourgeois compte actuellement plus de 60 entreprises membres. 
 
http://cluster-maritime.lu/members-expertise/
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, International co-operation and development, Energy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
- Intérêt pour tous les dossiers liés à l'économie maritime (transport, recherche, sécurité, énergies marines, environnement), l'économie fluviale et la logistique. 
 
- European Maritime Day https://ec.europa.eu/maritimeaffairs/content/invitation-european-maritime-day-2018_en 
 
- Suivi du cadre législatif européen concernant les affaires maritimes  
 
- European Inland Barging Innovation Platform: https://eibip.eu/
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Membre de l'European Network of Maritime Cluster (ENMC)
relevant_communication:
- Organisation annuelle de la Journée Européenne de la mer au Luxembourg https://ec.europa.eu/maritimeaffairs/content/invitation-european-maritime-day-2018_en 
Valoriser les activités liées aux mers et aux océans auprès d'un public très large 
 
- ENMC
goals__remit:
The Luxembourg Maritime Cluster is a non-profit organization which promotes and safeguards the interests of its member companies. 
In addition to its role as the voice of the Luxembourg maritime economy, the Cluster serves as a focal point for global maritime stakeholders looking to engage with its 65 member companies specialized in maritime transportation, dredging, logistics, finance, law, insurance, consulting, safety & security and marine equipment. 
 
 
1) NETWORKING 
Business events 
International trade fairs 
Partnership building 
 
2) PROMOTION & LOBBYING 
Public statements 
Legal monitoring 
Meetings with political authorities 
 
3) KNOWLEDGE SHARING 
Conferences 
Technological watch 
Public awareness (European Maritime Day) 
 
4) BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT 
Working groups 
B2b events 
Organisation of trade missions
